p: DNA sequences: NCBI SRA Accession number PRJNA601975. Field and laboratory data: Peer‐reviewed data release on USGS ScienceBase ( https://doi.org/10.5066/P9HP8UXZ). All code for bioinformatics and statistical analysis made public via peer‐reviewed USGS software release and deposited on code.usgs.gov ( https://doi.org/10.5066/P93BBZWU).
